channel.title: I Need Help Adding Custom Crowns!
channel.description: So I downloaded a bunch of crown types i like but idk where to put them or how to add them to make them mod admin owner donator crowns, the original gold crown and silver come with the server and you cant see those in the sprites how do i add these to the sprites and use them?

item.title: I Need Help Adding Custom Crowns!
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

You will have to edit your cache with toms cache editor then load your cache.

But look for modicons.

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help Adding Custom Crowns!

item.title: I Need Help Adding Custom Crowns!
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“elite expert, post:3, topic:523556”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=642103.msg4324213#msg4324213 date=1372630199]
Crowns are in your cache, if your cache packed use tom’s cache suite.
[/quote]
Well i looked in my cache and i didnt see any crowns in there to replace with the ones i want, in my cache i can see all the things inside like everything used but i cant seem to find the crowns, to me i feel like they arnt there, I also found something is the client.java in the client folder it was like @cr3@ for a crown im guessing so idk[/quote]
Pm me your teamviewer information.

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help Adding Custom Crowns!

item.title: I Need Help Adding Custom Crowns!
item.dc:creator: @elite_expert elite expert
item.description:
@elite_expert wrote:

Host Gushers:

Crowns are in your cache, if your cache packed use tom’s cache suite.

Well i looked in my cache and i didnt see any crowns in there to replace with the ones i want, in my cache i can see all the things inside like everything used but i cant seem to find the crowns, to me i feel like they arnt there, I also found something is the client.java in the client folder it was like @cr3@ for a crown im guessing so idk

Read full topic
